original_text: For he had often been chained hand and foot, but he tore the chains apart and broke the irons on his feet. No one was strong enough to subdue him.
korean_text: 이는 여러 번 고랑과 쇠사슬에 매였어도 쇠사슬을 끊고 고랑을 깨뜨렸음이러라 그리하여 아무도 그를 제어할 힘이 없는지라

sentences.original_text: For he had often been chained hand and foot
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 종종 손과 발이 쇠사슬에 묶였었으나

sentences.original_text: but he tore the chains apart
and broke the irons on his feet
